Desert_SandDragon_Initial: Its maw gapes at the desert sun. Even in death, it yearns for a taste.
Desert_SandDragon_ConsumeEssence: You place the essence in the dragon's maw. Only then do you notice a note hidden in the eye socket:
Desert_SandDragon_MrQiNote: 'You've proven yourself, kid. Check out the pile of lumber next to your house. -Mr. Qi'
Railroad_Box_ConsumeShell: You throw the shell into the box. Immediately, a note falls down from the rafters above:
Railroad_Box_MrQiNote: 'Well done. Your next task: Place 10 beets inside Mayor's fridge. -Mr. Qi'
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_Singleplayer: Pelican Town Ledger Book... It looks like the mayor uses this to keep track of finances.
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_NoFarmhands: If any farmhands join your farm, you can transfer money to each other.
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_Clie: Pelican Town Ledger Book... The owner of the farm can request the mayor to split the funds of the farmhands.
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_Sepa: Split the funds of each farmer? Tonight, the money will be divided evenly. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Ho: It's the mayor's ledger book. What would you like to do?
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Me: Merge the funds of each farmer? Tonight, everyone's money will be combined. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Tr: Who would you like to send money to?
ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Ho: How much money would you like to send?
ManorHouse_DivorceBook_NoSpouse: Pelican Town Marriage Log... After marriage, you may file for divorce here. Let's hope that isn't necessary!
ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Question: File for divorce? There is a 50,000g fee.
ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled: Your divorce request has been cancelled.
ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed: Your divorce papers have been filed, but your spouse won't know until tomorrow morning. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
ManorHouse_MayorFridge_Initial: It's the mayor's fridge. It's mostly full of milk and iced tea.
ManorHouse_MayorFridge_ConsumeBeets: You quickly place the beets in the fridge. Wait a sec... there's a note taped to the milk. It's addressed to you:
ManorHouse_MayorFridge_MrQiNote: 'Good job, kid. Your final task: Give the sand dragon his last meal. -Mr. Qi'
Tunnel_TunnelSafe_Initial: It's a battery powered lock-box. Unfortunately, there's no battery in it.
Tunnel_TunnelSafe_ConsumeBattery: It worked! The lock-box swings open. Inside, there's a note:
Tunnel_TunnelSafe_MrQiNote: 'Your first task: Bring a rainbow shell to the train platform. Leave it in the box. -Mr. Qi'
SkullCave_SkullDoor_Unlock: You insert the skull key into the keyhole. It's a perfect fit!
Farm_GreenhouseRuins: Whatever this once was, it's now in ruins.
Saloon_Arcade_PK_NewGame+: Press button for a more difficult journey...
JoshHouse_Alex_Trash: There's a bunch of protein bar wrappers.
SamHouse_Sam_Trash: Looks like Sam cleans his trash bin regularly.
SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: It's full of clothes... wait. There's a sword hidden under the clothes.
Submarine_SubmergeQuestion: Captain: Ahoy there! Want to take the deep-sea fishing tour? It'll cost ya 1,000g.
Submarine_AscendQuestion: Captain: Shall I take us back up?
Submarine_Done: Captain: We're back! Make sure not to leave any fish lying around.
Mines_MineElevator_NotWorking: It doesn't seem to be working...
Mines_ResetMine:
Reset your progress in the mine?
(You'll be back at mine level 1).
Club_CalicoJack_HS: This table's for the big shots. It's a 1000 coin bet.
Club_CalicoJack: Wanna play some CalicoJack? This is the 100 coin table.
Club_QiCoins_BuyStarter: You have 0 Club Coins. Buy a starter pack for 1000g?
Club_ClubSeller: Psst... I have a 'Statue of Endless Fortune' for sale... only 1,000,000g. What do you say?
Club_ClubSeller_NotEnoughMoney: Hey, I said 1,000,000g! This isn't gonna cut it.
Town_DwarfGrave_Translated:
You translate the dwarvish:

Stand between the pillars three
With gift as precious as the sky:
A rainbow forged from land, not sea
Then galaxies will heed your cry.
Town_mgThiefMessage: Shadow Guy: Eeeeep! You caught me! I'm sorry! Take it! Take it! It looked so valuable, I couldn't help myself...
Town_SpecialCharmQuestion: Driver: Hey kid... I need a lucky break... why don't 'cha bring me a 'rabbit's foot'? I'll make it worth your while.
Town_specialCharmNoFoot: Driver: Come back when you got a 'rabbit's foot' on ya, kid.
LockedDoor_FriendsOnly: It's locked... Only {0}'s friends can enter uninvited.
ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu: What can I do for you?
ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent:
Sorry! Shop's closed for the day... I'm at Caroline's place for aerobics club.

-Robin
ArchaeologyHouse_Rearrange: Would you like to rearrange the museum's collection?
HaleyHouse_EmilyRoomObject: There's a tape inside: 'Freeform Dance Rhythms'
Club_CalicoJack_Rules1: The objective is to get as close to 21 as possible. Cards range from 1 to 9, except for the first card which can be as high as 11. Each player starts with two cards, but the dealer's first card remains hidden. Each turn you can choose to draw a random number between 1 and 9 or pass.
Club_CalicoJack_Rules2: Once you pass, the dealer's hidden card is revealed. She must draw until her total reaches or exceeds 18. If either player exceeds 21 on their turn, they lose. If the dealer passes, then all cards are revealed and the highest score wins.
Club_CalicoJackHS_NotEnoughCoins: You need at least 1000 coins to play here.
Club_CalicoJack_NotEnoughCoins: Hey, the betting's fixed at 100 coins. You don't have enough. Go buy some coins from the machine if you want to play.
ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse1: I can increase the size of your house and add a kitchen. It will cost 10,000g and you'll also need to provide me with 450 pieces of wood. Are you interested?
ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse2: I can increase the size of your house and add a nursery. It will cost {0}g and you'll also need to provide me with {1} pieces of hardwood. Are you interested?
ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse3: I can add a cellar to your house. The cellar can be used to age certain products, like wine and cheese. It will cost 100,000g. Are you interested?
ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...What's that? You want to build Pam a house? That's a great idea!^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g...
ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need {0} pieces of wood.
ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughHardwood: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need {0} pieces of hardwood.
Farm_WeedsDestruction: The spreading weeds have caused damage to your farm.
JojaMart_SignUp: If you become a Joja Member, the community center will become a Joja Warehouse, and you will no longer be able to refurbish it. However, Joja will provide an alternative means to improving the town. Are you sure you want to join?
Mines_Overrun: This area is overrun with monsters.
Railroad_TrainComing: A train is passing through Stardew Valley.
Town_SeedShopSign:
- Pierre's General Store -
Now open 7 days a week From 9am-5pm!
Town_PickupTruck: It's just the back of Lewis' old pickup truck...
Sewer_DogStatue: -Statue Of Uncertainty-^The statue can help you change professions.^Make an offering of 10,000g?
Sewer_DogStatueQuestion: Which skill's professions would you like to change?
Sewer_DogStatueAlready: This skill is already being altered tonight. Come back tomorrow...
WitchHut_EvilShrineLeft: -Dark Shrine of Selfishness-^Your children will turn into doves and fly away...^Make an offering of one Prismatic Shard?
WitchHut_EvilShrineLeftInactive: -Dark Shrine of Selfishness-^The statue stares through you...
WitchHut_EvilShrineCenter: -Dark Shrine of Memory-^The relationship between you and your ex-spouses will be wiped from memory. It will be like you've never met.^Make an offering of 30,000g?
WitchHut_EvilShrineCenterInactive: -Dark Shrine of Memory-^The statue stares through you...
WitchHut_EvilShrineRightActivate: -Dark Shrine of Night Terrors-^The ancient magi-seal of protection will be lifted, allowing monsters to appear on your farm at night.^Make an offering of one Strange Bun?
WitchHut_EvilShrineRightDeActivate: -Dark Shrine of Night Terrors-^The ancient magi-seal of protection will be restored, preventing monsters from appearing on your farm at night.^Make an offering of one Strange Bun?
WitchHut_NoOffering: You don't have the necessary offering.
Sewer_MagicSeal: There's some kind of force-field blocking your path.
Woods_Statue:
--Old Master Cannoli--
...Still searching for the sweetest taste...
ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled_Krobus: You've changed your mind about kicking {0} out.
ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed_Krobus: You've decided to kick {0} out of the house. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
Theater_MovieEnd: The movie has concluded for tonight. We hope you enjoyed the show!
HaleyHouse_SewingMachine: It's a sewing machine... But I'm not sure how to use it.
HaleyHouse_DyePot: An array of brightly colored dyes.
Caroline_Sunroom_Door: Caroline only lets her friends enter here...
Caroline_Tea_Event1: When I'm alone with relaxing tea...
Caroline_Tea_Event2: My mind is empty and free to wander...
Desert_Trader_Closed: Closed until the 18th for the Pelican Town night market.

IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Prompt_LeftPlan: Island Survey -- Please report the number of purple flowers present on the island.
IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleFlower_Qu: How many purple flowers can be found on the island?
IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleFlower_Wr: Hmm... That number doesn't fit my models at all... Maybe you should give it another shot tomorrow.$s
IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleFlower_Co: Yes, yes... that seems very accurate. Thank you!$h
IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Prompt_RightPla: Island Survey -- Please report the number of purple starfish present on the island.
IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleStarfish_: How many purple starfish can be found on the island?
IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Failed: Hmm... I think you should take a break and try doing the survey again tomorrow...

ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveCrib: Remove Crib/Remove the crib from your home./Select a crib to remove.
ScienceHouse_Renovation_BuildCrib: Build Crib/Builds a crib in your home./Select a location for the crib.
ScienceHouse_Renovation_OpenBedroom: Open Bedroom/Removes the wall separating your bedroom and the entrance room./Select an area for the renovation.
ScienceHouse_Renovation_CloseBedroom: Close Bedroom/Builds a wall separating your bedroom and the entrance room./Select an area for the renovation.
ScienceHouse_Renovation_AddSouthernRoom: Add Southern Room/Adds a room to the south of your bedroom./Select an area for the renovation.
ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveSouthernRo: Remove Southern Room/Removes the room to the south of your bedroom./Select an area for the renovation.
ScienceHouse_Renovation_AddCornerRoom: Add Corner Room/Adds a room in the northeast corner of the house./Select an area for the renovation.
ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveCornerRoom: Remove Corner Room/Removes the room in the northeast corner of the house./Select an area for the renovation.
Gourmand_Intro: *Kribbibbit*... Who dares to enter my nest?|Ah... A humble farmer, come to cultivate my lands... How fortunate!|Oh, how the rains have blessed me!
Gourmand_RequestIntro: *Gurrp*... You see... my fields once teemed with fresh fruit and vegetables...|But I have grown old, and without the vigor of youth, my fields have turned to worthless dust...|*sigh*... What I would give to feast my eyes upon that banquet of delights, once more...|That's where you come in.
Gourmand_RequestQuestion: Ah... You have something to show me?
Gourmand_RequestFailed: *Kriibbitt*... What is the meaning of this?! You haven't grown the thing which I seek... Now go!
Gourmand_Request_0: You must grow for me... that sweet delight, which is both pink and juicy...|Do not pluck it from the earth! I wish to see it in its natural state...
Gourmand_Request_0_Success: *Gurrrp*... Yes... This is it!|...It's bringing me back to the old days... sunny days, when things were sweeter...|*slurp*... Oh, I could take a big, juicy bite...|...But, I won't.
Gourmand_Request_1: I wish to see the long yellow thing, which tickles the skin, and waves in the wind.
Gourmand_Request_1_Success: *Gurrrp*... Yes... This is it!|Heh... It reminds me of an old girlfriend... *gurp*...|Look here... I could tickle you with this!|...But, I won't.
Gourmand_Request_2: I would like to see the zesty ground fruit, which maketh the breath stink...
Gourmand_Request_2_Success: *Gurrrp*... Yes... I ate this once, long ago. It gave me a pungent aroma for days...|...Reminds me of Papa, when I was just a tadpole...|Heh... I could take a bite, and produce that poignant odor once more...|...But, I won't.
Gourmand_Reward: *Kriibbitt*... Yes... I am very pleased.|Here... This is for you.
Gourmand_LastReward: *Kriibbitt*... Yes... You have done me a great service. You've given an old toad one last trip down memory lane...|Here's one last reward for you, friend.
Gourmand_Finished: *Kriibbitt*... Good to see you again, my friend.|You have my blessing to cultivate these fields. May the rains be with you!
Gourmand_InProgress: Ah... I see you are growing the thing I seek. However, it is still but a child. Come back when it has matured...

Took me three years sailing the high seas to find his remains.$s"/emote Birdie 28/speak Birdie "*sigh*...$s#$b#I've been here ever since, dear.$s#$b#...Guarding his bones..."/faceDirection farmer 2 true/playSound batScreech/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Birdie 2/speak Birdie "My child... It's an old photograph that washed up on shore.#$b#It's all I have to offer... but somehow, I think it will help you find what I seek."/pause 500/unskippable/playSound coin/awardFestivalPrize memento true/pause 10/addQuest 130/pause 1700/end
IslandSecret_Event_BirdieFinished: tropical_island_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 20 58 3/removeQuest 130/skippable/addTemporaryActor Birdie 32 32 17 58 3 true/animate Birdie false true 1000 8 9/pause 1000/viewport 18 58 clamp true/pause 2300/playMusic none/animate farmer true true 100 35/addObject 19 58 870/playSound sandyStep/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/playFramesAhead 3/stopAnimation Birdie/extendSourceRect Birdie reset/warp Birdie 18 58/move Birdie 0 -1 2/move Birdie 1 0 2/pause 500/jump Birdie/pause 500/playMusic desolate/speak Birdie "It's his...$s"/emote Birdie 20/pause 1200/playSound coin/removeObject 19 58/showFrame Birdie 20/pause 2500/speak Birdie "Heh... It still has his smell, after all these years...#$b#...that familiar, putrid funk...$h"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 2 true/playSound croak/animate farmer false false 350 104 105 104 105 104 105/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Birdie "You know... It's been a lonely life here, child... but I don't regret it at all.#$b#I'm doin' right by my old man... and we'll be together again some day soon... hehe"/pause 500/stopAnimation Birdie/move Birdie 0 1 3/playMusic tropical_island_day_ambient/faceDirection Birdie 1/quickQuestion #It's an honorable thing to do.#He's gone. You should live your life.(break)speak Birdie "You have great wisdom, child.#$b#And you've brought me great peace... this locket will comfort me for the rest of my days.$h"(break)emote Birdie 28\speak Birdie "An old woman like me? I think it's too late, dear...$s#$b#Besides... I like it here! It's relaxing and beautiful. And I have an endless supply of fresh fish, oysters, and monkey meat. FieldOfficeFinale: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 8 0/addCraftingRecipe Ostrich Incubator/addMailReceived fieldOfficeFinale/skippable/addTemporaryActor SafariGuy 16 32 3 8 0 true character/translateName SafariGuy Strings\NPCNames:ProfessorSnail/pause 1000/viewport 4 6 true/pause 4000/speak SafariGuy "Wow...#$b#Look how far we've come!$h"/faceDirection SafariGuy 1/speak SafariGuy "The collection looks fantastic, and it's all thanks to you, @."/emote farmer 32/speak SafariGuy "Here, as a way of saying 'thanks', I want to teach you something."/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 700/playSound reward/message "Learned how to craft 'Ostrich Incubator'"/pause 400/speak SafariGuy "This device will allow you to raise ostriches back home. Just place the incubator in a barn, place an ostrich egg inside, and wait..."/faceDirection SafariGuy 0/speak SafariGuy "Getting your hands on an ostrich egg is a different story, though... I'll leave that up to you!"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak SafariGuy "Heh... Well... now the real work begins.#$b#I'll be studying these bones for years to come!"/faceDirection SafariGuy 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak SafariGuy "Farewell, @!"/pause 600/end

ManorHouse_LAF_Check_OrdersUnlocked: The town's 'Lost and Found' box. You can collect incomplete deliveries from past special orders here.
ManorHouse_LAF_DonationItems: Collect lost items and incomplete deliveries
ManorHouse_LAF_FarmhandItemsQuestion: Who would you like to retrieve items from?
FieldOfficeDonated_0: Ah... Now this is a truly fascinating piece of natural history! Thank you.
FieldOfficeDonated_1: Beautiful! These bones are exactly what I'm looking for. Now, let me clean my magnifying lens...
FieldOfficeDonated_2: You've outdone yourself, @. This is one of the most pristine specimens I've ever seen. Thank you!$h
FieldOfficeDonated_3: To think... generations have come and gone while this little bone lay hidden beneath the soil. Now it's mine!
FieldOfficeDonated_Reward: And would you look at that! With this donation, we've got another full set piece completed.$h#$b#I've got a little something waiting for you behind the counter, when you're ready for it!
Volcano_ShortcutOut: Take the shortcut out of the volcano?
SeedShop_MoneyBox: I'm taking the day off to visit the island. Please place your money in the box. No cheating!^     -Pierre
AnimalShop_MoneyBox: I'm visiting the island today. If you need to buy anything, just leave the money in this box!^     -Marnie
Saloon_MoneyBox: I'm tending the bar on Ginger Island today, but I won't let that stop you from buying something!^     -Gus
ScienceHouse_MoneyBox: I'm on the island today, but you can still buy something. It's an honor system!^     -Robin
ChallengeShrine_NotYetHard: --Shrine Of Challenge--^Dispel the ancient magi-seal of protection, allowing powerful monsters to ascend from the deep?
ChallengeShrine_AlreadyHard: --Shrine Of Challenge--^Summon an ancient magi-seal protection, returning the mines to their original state?
ChallengeShrine_Activated: Your request will be granted overnight.
ChallengeShrine_AlreadyActive: You've already put in a request.
ChallengeShrine_OnQiChallenge: There's a note from Mr. Qi: ^ I've temporarily disabled this shrine. Come back tomorrow!
Gil_Telephone: Hey. 150 Magma Sprites, huh? I'm impressed.#$b#Tell you what... I'm gonna give you Marlon's tellie-phone number. He don't like me givin' it out, but I think you've earned it.#$b#If you ever need to use the Item Recovery Service, but don't wanna run all the way out here... just give us a ring. Sound good?
AnimalHouse_Incubator_HouseFull: An egg is ready to hatch, but the building is full.
ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade2: ...What's that? You'd like me to add a few shortcuts around the valley? Sure, I can do that!^I'll just need 300,000g...
Backwoods_MonsterGrave: Abigail took a life to save mine...#I'll never forget that.
